trans-unit.source: Creating a Snapshot of a Blob
trans-unit.target: Creating a Snapshot of a Blob

trans-unit.source: You can create a snapshot of a blob.
trans-unit.target: You can create a snapshot of a blob.

trans-unit.source: A snapshot is a read-only version of a blob that's taken at a point in time.
trans-unit.target: A snapshot is a read-only version of a blob that's taken at a point in time.

trans-unit.source: Once a snapshot has been created, it can be read, copied, or deleted, but not modified.
trans-unit.target: Once a snapshot has been created, it can be read, copied, or deleted, but not modified.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots provide a way to back up a blob as it appears at a moment in time.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots provide a way to back up a blob as it appears at a moment in time.

trans-unit.source: A snapshot of a blob has the same name as the base blob from which the snapshot is taken, with a <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value appended to indicate the time at which the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: A snapshot of a blob has the same name as the base blob from which the snapshot is taken, with a <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value appended to indicate the time at which the snapshot was taken.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the page blob URI is <codeInline>http://storagesample.core.blob.windows.net/mydrives/myvhd</codeInline>, the snapshot URI will be similar to <codeInline>http://storagesample.core.blob.windows.net/mydrives/myvhd?snapshot=2011-03-09T01:42:34.9360000Z</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: For example, if the page blob URI is <codeInline>http://storagesample.core.blob.windows.net/mydrives/myvhd</codeInline>, the snapshot URI will be similar to <codeInline>http://storagesample.core.blob.windows.net/mydrives/myvhd?snapshot=2011-03-09T01:42:34.9360000Z</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: This value may be used to reference the snapshot for further operations.
trans-unit.target: This value may be used to reference the snapshot for further operations.

trans-unit.source: A blob's snapshots share its URI and are distinguished only by this <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value.
trans-unit.target: A blob's snapshots share its URI and are distinguished only by this <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value.

trans-unit.source: In client library code, the blob's <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.StorageClient.BlobAttributes.Snapshot</codeEntityReference> property returns a <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value that uniquely identifies the snapshot relative to its base blob.
trans-unit.target: In client library code, the blob's <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.StorageClient.BlobAttributes.Snapshot</codeEntityReference> property returns a <languageKeyword>DateTime</languageKeyword> value that uniquely identifies the snapshot relative to its base blob.

trans-unit.source: You can use this value to perform further operations on the snapshot.
trans-unit.target: You can use this value to perform further operations on the snapshot.

trans-unit.source: A blob may have any number of snapshots.
trans-unit.target: A blob may have any number of snapshots.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots persist until they are explicitly deleted A snapshot cannot outlive its source blob.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots persist until they are explicitly deleted A snapshot cannot outlive its source blob.

trans-unit.source: You can enumerate the snapshots associated with your blob to track your current snapshots.
trans-unit.target: You can enumerate the snapshots associated with your blob to track your current snapshots.

trans-unit.source: Inheriting Properties
trans-unit.target: Inheriting Properties

trans-unit.source: When you create a snapshot of a blob, system properties are copied to the snapshot with the same values.
trans-unit.target: When you create a snapshot of a blob, system properties are copied to the snapshot with the same values.

trans-unit.source: This list shows copied system properties for the .NET storage client library:
trans-unit.target: This list shows copied system properties for the .NET storage client library:

trans-unit.source: A lease associated with the base blob is not copied to the snapshot.
trans-unit.target: A lease associated with the base blob is not copied to the snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Snapshots cannot be leased.
trans-unit.target: Snapshots cannot be leased.

trans-unit.source: Copying Snapshots
trans-unit.target: Copying Snapshots

trans-unit.source: Copy operations involving blobs and snapshots follow these rules:
trans-unit.target: Copy operations involving blobs and snapshots follow these rules:

trans-unit.source: You can copy a snapshot over its base blob.
trans-unit.target: You can copy a snapshot over its base blob.

trans-unit.source: By promoting a snapshot to the position of the base blob, you can restore an earlier version of a blob.
trans-unit.target: By promoting a snapshot to the position of the base blob, you can restore an earlier version of a blob.

trans-unit.source: The snapshot remains, but its source is overwritten with a copy that can be both read and written.
trans-unit.target: The snapshot remains, but its source is overwritten with a copy that can be both read and written.

trans-unit.source: You can copy a snapshot to a destination blob with a different name.
trans-unit.target: You can copy a snapshot to a destination blob with a different name.

trans-unit.source: The resulting destination blob is a writeable blob and not a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: The resulting destination blob is a writeable blob and not a snapshot.

trans-unit.source: When a source blob is copied, any snapshots of the source blob are not copied to the destination.
trans-unit.target: When a source blob is copied, any snapshots of the source blob are not copied to the destination.

trans-unit.source: When a destination blob is overwritten with a copy, any snapshots associated with the destination blob stay intact under its name.
trans-unit.target: When a destination blob is overwritten with a copy, any snapshots associated with the destination blob stay intact under its name.

trans-unit.source: When you create a snapshot of a block blob, the blob's committed block list is also copied to the snapshot.
trans-unit.target: When you create a snapshot of a block blob, the blob's committed block list is also copied to the snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Any uncommitted blocks are not copied.
trans-unit.target: Any uncommitted blocks are not copied.

trans-unit.source: Specifying an Access Condition
trans-unit.target: Specifying an Access Condition

trans-unit.source: You can specify an access condition so that the snapshot is created only if a condition is met.
trans-unit.target: You can specify an access condition so that the snapshot is created only if a condition is met.

trans-unit.source: To specify an access condition, use the <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.StorageClient.BlobRequestOptions.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> property.
trans-unit.target: To specify an access condition, use the <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.StorageClient.BlobRequestOptions.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> property.

trans-unit.source: If the specified condition is not met, the snapshot is not created, and the Blob service returns status code <externalLink><linkText>HTTPStatusCode.PreconditionFailed</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.httpstatuscode.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: If the specified condition is not met, the snapshot is not created, and the Blob service returns status code <externalLink><linkText>HTTPStatusCode.PreconditionFailed</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.httpstatuscode.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Deleting Snapshots
trans-unit.target: Deleting Snapshots

trans-unit.source: A blob that has snapshots cannot be deleted unless the snapshots are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: A blob that has snapshots cannot be deleted unless the snapshots are also deleted.

trans-unit.source: You can delete a snapshot individually, or tell the storage service to delete all snapshots when deleting the source blob.
trans-unit.target: You can delete a snapshot individually, or tell the storage service to delete all snapshots when deleting the source blob.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to delete a blob that still has snapshots, your call will return an error.
trans-unit.target: If you attempt to delete a blob that still has snapshots, your call will return an error.

trans-unit.source: Constructing the Absolute URI to a Snapshot
trans-unit.target: Constructing the Absolute URI to a Snapshot

trans-unit.source: This code example constructs the absolute URI of a snapshot from its base blob object.
trans-unit.target: This code example constructs the absolute URI of a snapshot from its base blob object.
